message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you might be interested in. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $60 is a bit lower than I was thinking. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession, so I'm counteroffering at $85. This is as low as I'm willing to go. Is this a price you'd be willing to pay?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit stuck on $80. Is this a price you'd be willing to accept?
